mapper.select: SELECT B.ibuyer, A.nick, A.stored_pic, A.request_pic, D.iproduct, D.title, D.stored_pic, D.request_pic, B.ireview, B.raiting, B.`contents` FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_review B ON A.iuser = B.ibuyer JOIN t_product_payment C ON B.ipayment = C.ipayment JOIN t_product D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE B.ibuyer = #{ibuyer};

SELECT B.iuser AS loginedIuser, A.iproduct, A.price, A.deposit, A.title, A.stored_pic, A.request_pic, A.iproduct, A.iproduct, B.nick, B.stored_pic, B.request_pic FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iuser = #{loginedIuser};
